# First function



# Third function

```{r third}
set.seed(23)
x = rnorm(30,mean=10,sd=12)
Rpackage::myci(x)

```


# Forth function


```{r forth}
x = rnorm(45,mean=30,sd=13)
Rpackage::myboot(iter = 10000, x, fun = "mean", alpha = 0.05)
```
